gold.user: User wants to create a new Twilio application to handle incoming calls.
gold.ideal: The application is created successfully with a unique SID.

gold.user: User needs to retrieve a list of all applications associated with their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: A list of applications is returned, each with its SID and friendly name.

gold.user: User wants to delete an application that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: The application is deleted successfully, and a confirmation message is returned.

gold.user: User wants to fetch details of a specific application to check its configuration.
gold.ideal: The details of the application are returned, including its SID and settings.

gold.user: User needs to update the settings of an existing Twilio application.
gold.ideal: The application is updated successfully with the new settings.
